item.title: What is the Wassenaar Arrangement?
item.description: Authors: Wassenaar Arrangement Secretariat Published: February 2020 URL: https://www.wassenaar.org/the-wassenaar-arrangement/ Tags: 1990s Export Controls International / National Security Wassenar Arrangement Abstract: The Wassenaar Arrangement (WA), the first global multilateral arrangement on export controls for conventional weapons and sensitive dual-use goods and technologies, received final approval by 33 co-founding countries in July 1996 and began operations in September 1996. The WA was designed to promote transparency, exchange of views and information and greater responsibility in transfers of â€¦ Continued
